section.section: A person licensed under this subtitle may not contract or solicit to provide mold remediation services unless the work of the licensee is covered by insurance in the amount of at least $1,000,000.
A licensee shall give the Commission notice of the cancellation of insurance at least 10 days before the effective date of the cancellation.

text.section: A person licensed to provide mold remediation services under this subtitle is not required to pay assessments to the Fund under Subtitle 4 of this title.
